I have tested importing ejbs to several generic servers but I was unable to
create this one. I had a similiar case when a runtime is deleted earlier but
this is fixed. Which WTP build are you using? Did you remove a runtime that was
defined earlier?
I have 06/21 build, i was not able to reproduce this case always though.

I have checked with I0623 build, could not reproduce. I am closing this for now
please reopen if you encounter again.
